FuncDef: The reset service command clears service records.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To prevent existing service records from affecting service exception cause identification, you can run the reset service command to clear the service records of a specific type before you reproduce a problem for troubleshooting.
Configuration Impact
Cleared service records cannot be restored. Therefore, exercise caution when running the reset service command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
